title: Washington's Spies. The Story of America's First Spy Ring
description: This is a book that takes the human stories of living life during the revolutionary war. It shows how AmericaÂ´s first real spy ring was formed and how they used deception, cunning, and wit to deliver intelligence. It also gives insights into the motivations of the people who choose to rebel against the British or to preserve the British empire in the colonies.
